title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, goals, and timeline. Identify stakeholders and their requirements. Create a project plan and manage resources.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Collect and analyze requirements from stakeholders. Understand the philosophical domains and theories to be covered. Define functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Define the AI model architecture (consider using transformer-based models for text analysis), training approach (utilize a combination of supervised learning with pre-trained models and unsupervised learning for knowledge graph construction), and data requirements (philosophical texts, arguments, theories, and associated metadata). Consider scalability, performance, maintainability, modularity, security aspects, edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations. Incorporate guidelines for testing, documentation, and version control, including unit tests, integration tests, code comments, and clear documentation of each component and their interactions. Propose a strategy for continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) to ensure efficient software development, delivery, and maintenance. Update the RFC state to 'REVIEWED' since the task is ready for further review.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, considering usability, accessibility, and user experience.

title: Data Acquisition and Preparation
description: Acquire and prepare philosophical texts, arguments, and theories for training the AI model. Ensure data quality and relevance.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for understanding and analyzing philosophical arguments and theories. Implement natural language processing and reasoning capabilities.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services and APIs for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, including data management, model integration, and user interaction.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, integrating with the backend services and AI model.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute testing strategies for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the AI-powered philosophy assistant adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations, such as data privacy and ethical AI guidelines.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment and implement DevOps practices for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AI-powered philosophy assistant, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
